data.text: @anne_matie @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer Thank you! Vaccines and booster doing their job so feeling ok really. Hope things are well with you. x
@Istimrar @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer Hope your symptoms clear soon take care
@Istimrar @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer Oh no! I've avoided it so far too. Was under the impression I am superwoman!
@gaff_jen @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer I had avoided it! I’m pure ragin’.I was convinced I was going to go the whole way not getting it. Beelin’. 😡😂 https://t.co/yLB05EIJD3
@Istimrar @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer Had you managed to avoid it until now or is this a second dose?
@Margare58754295 @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer Thanks, Margaret. Fingers crossed! Just tired so far. Glad to hear Ian was ok. How are things?

@UnionTyke @marissamcteague @DavieDaibhidh @malprin @BBCiPlayer Thanks, Richard. Sorry to hear you had a rotten time. No real symptoms so far. Just tired. Hoping it stays that way! Thank goodness for vaccines.
